mapper.select: select code from goodsForLevels where name = null or name = ''

select goods.goodsid, goods.code, goods.name, goods.unit, goods.specs, sum(detail.inqty - detail.outqty) as onhand from goods left join detailbillflow detail on goods.goodsid = detail.goodsid where goods.name like #{name} group by goods.goodsid, goods.code, goods.name, goods.unit, goods.specs
select distinct specification from goodsForLevels where name like #{name} or code like #{name}
select code, ifnull(imagepath, '') as imagepath from goodsForLevels;
mapper.update: update goodsForLevels set imagepath = #{imagePath} where code = #{code}
